comment._content: After the war the photographer worked for Fortune magazine, and later gave up professional photography to become a chef in Vermont.

comment.author: 25250131@N06
comment._content: Great Picture ! I invite you to visit and join my recently-created group: www.flickr.com/groups/italian_migration/ dedicated to migration acrross the world, and to have this picture and other related to Italian migrants added to the group. Thanks.

comment._content: Ciao, sono amministratore di un gruppo chiamato Italian migration. Ci farebbe piacere aggiungere l’elemento al gruppo.

comment._content: Lovely photograph! I wish that more American children today appreciated their country, flawed as it may be!
